text:
Of course, she will "legalize this" and put it in her voice. I hope you see this as helpful and consistent with the asks you made above. I fear this will still
take at least a week and probably 2k, but feel like it sets us to work well together constructively in the future. I can't tell you how much I appreciate
our partnership and updated "expectations of engagement" since your email on our path back to normalcy. I'm all in, Christine. Just watch me go
Message 1168 of 4024
So.. yes. Please keep any required documentation that you will need for taxes.
For stock sales, I have tried to be smart about our sales. This includes selling long-term stocks if MSFT or Moyer, as well as cleaning out some losers
that won't hit our bill and might even offset some gains. So, my hope is I managed my end well and you will manage your end well.
We have always been super at this together, so I want to enjoy our "secret weapon for wealth-making" as long as I can. Amy way we can get a divorce
but keep doing this part....? lol
<<insert inappropriate joke about other things we are great at together for consideration here>>
